mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news(seq, title, content, authorship, url, createdate, id) VALUES ( seq_news.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{authorship}, #{url}, SYSDATE, #{member.username} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS PAGE, A.* FROM (SELECT seq, title, authorship, url FROM news ORDER BY seq DESC) A ) WHERE PAGE = #{page}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS PAGE, A.* FROM (SELECT seq, title, authorship, url FROM news WHERE ${searchArea} LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY seq DESC) A ) WHERE page = #{page}
SELECT ceil(count(1)/10) FROM news WHERE ${searchArea} LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
